text: Jackson Wang (; ; born 28 March 1994) is a Hong Kong rapper, singer and dancer based in China. He is known for being part of the K-POP Boy Group "GOT7" and later his self created group "Panthepack" where he develops as main rapper, dancer and singer. As a soloist he's been recognized for his talent in songwriting and producing, being founder and CEO of "Team Wang Records" and also as a fashion desinger in "Team Wang Desing". ==Other websites== * Jackson Wang on Vevo * Jackson on JYP Publishing Category:1994 births Category:Hong Kong actors Category:Hong Kong singers Category:K-pop singers Category:Living people Category:JYP Entertainment artists
title: Jackson Wang
